statusLine.command: bash -c 'input=$(timeout 1 cat 2>/dev/null || echo "{}"); DIR=$(echo "$input" | jq -r ".workspace.current_dir // \"$PWD\""); HOME_DIR=$(getent passwd "$USER" | cut -d: -f6); DISPLAY_DIR=$(echo "$DIR" | sed "s|^$HOME_DIR|~|"); MODEL=$(echo "$input" | jq -r ".model.display_name // empty"); SID=$(echo "$input" | jq -r ".session_id // empty" | cut -c1-13); cd "$DIR" 2>/dev/null; BRANCH=$(git branch --show-current 2>/dev/null); printf "\033[32m%s\033[0m@\033[33m%s\033[0m:\033[34m%s\033[0m" "$USER" "$(hostname -s)" "$DISPLAY_DIR"; [ -n "$BRANCH" ] && printf " [\033[35m%s\033[0m]" "$BRANCH"; [ -n "$MODEL" ] && printf " \033[36m%s\033[0m" "$MODEL"; [ -n "$SID" ] && printf " \033[90mSID %s\033[0m" "$SID"; printf "\n"'
